badge.title: Planetary Run Club
badge.text: Nowhere we can run to is too far,—and everyone you meet is a neighbor

support.title: Support the Journey
support.description: Your contribution covers the essentials: a support vehicle, crew logistics, travel permits, and documenting the journey.

map.routeAlt: Route from Vladivostok to Cabo da Roca

crew.desc: Looking for support crew across 29 segments. Be part of something delusional.

newsletter.title: Long Run Letter
newsletter.desc: Philosophy, endurance, and cultural musings from the road. Subscribe for updates.

instagram.title: Instagram
